title: A former mentor recalls the early career of Satoru Iwata
text:
A former mentor recalls the early career of Satoru Iwata 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
'Iwata was a so-called otaku,' recalls Yash Terakura, who mentored Satoru Iwata when he was a college kid eager to learn more about computer...
